title: Fall Detection (Belt-mounted)
description: Detect if the user has fallen. It's intended to be placed on a belt or waist.
long_description: This project allows you to build models to detect a fall using an IMU (Interial Mesurement Unit - accelerometer and gyroscope) mounted on the buckle of a belt.
